title.narrative: FODEP State of Democratic Accountability in Zambia

description.narrative: The project aims to increase the accountability of elected leaders by facilitating concrete connections between elected leaders and citizens. This will involve among others increasing citizens? awareness of political party manifestoes development of monito ring tools and establishing People?s Dialogue Platforms that enable interaction and consultations between decision-makers and the electorate. The one-year project will be carried out in North Western Muchinga and Northern Province of Zambia in a total of 1 2 districts. The project aims to reach a total electoral population of 600 people per province during the year. The beneficiaries include active members of five political parties all MPs in the target districts (21 in total) registered and potential voters private sector actors as well as other stakeholders such as CSOs and media.
